VCHA

Introduction

Camila is a Cuban-Canadian singer. She is a member of the girl group VCHA formed by the survival show "A2K" under JYP Entertainment.

Before joining A2K, Camila was a finalist on The Voice Kids in 2016 with her brother, Zion. Previously, they had made it to the finale of The Junior Voice Quebec before making their rounds to The Voice Kids: France.

She debuted in VCHA on January 26, 2024, with their first single album 'Girls of the Year".
